org.apache.hadoop.mapred.buffer
Class Manager

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hadoop.mapred.buffer.Manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
VersionedProtocol, BufferUmbilicalProtocol
public class Manager
extends java.lang.Object
implements BufferUmbilicalProtocol

Manages the output buffers and buffer requests of all tasks running on this TaskTracker. A task will generate some number of spill files and a final output. These spill files are contained in output(OutputFile) objects and passed to the controller via RPC call from the task process. Certain tasks will request buffers from upstream tasks. A ReduceTask will request its partition from all map tasks in the same job. A PipelinedMapTask will request the output of the corresponding ReduceTask in the upstream job.

Author:
tcondie
